titleSection.name: Tasktop Dev Connector for VersionOne
titleSection.shortDescription: View and update VersionOne work items directly from your IDE.

descriptionSection.description: The Tasktop Dev Connector for VersionOne integrates VersionOne's agile planning and project management platform with any Tasktop-enabled Eclipse-based IDE. Through integration with Tasktop Dev Pro, the VersionOne Connector also provides a standalone rich client application with offline access to VersionOne stories, defects and tasks.

commercial.shortDescription: The product is stable and supported.

mediaSection.title: Tasktop Dev VersionOne Connector Screencast
mediaSection.caption: View and update VersionOne work items directly from your IDE.
